title: Markdown Ready
content:
Python Markdown Library

As I was finalizing the pipeline for my blog, the process of creating posts was initially a lower priority. However, now that the blog is complete, I needed a way to format my posts—making it easier to space things out, emphasize important points, or ~~cross something out~~. I'm happy to report that the process of creating posts and developing tools to enhance the user experience for readers is now complete.

If you're a Python programmer and want to use the Markdown library, you can get started with the following commands:

bash pip install markdown

And then, in your Python script:

python import markdown
